item.title: Building a Cybersecurity Team: Key Skills, Steps, and Considerations
item.category: "Cybersecurity team building" , "NICE framework" , "Cybersecurity skills" , "Recruitment strategies" , "Training and development" , "Cybersecurity workforce" , "Cyber threats" , "Risk management" , "Incident response" , "Security architecture"
item.description: Discover how to build a cybersecurity team based on the NICE framework, focusing on key skills, steps, and considerations for effective risk mitigation.
